channel.title: 562 - Marionette Animation
channel.description:
Hey Guys well im coding a [562] Christmas event, Want im trying to do is adding animation to the marionette items, so when i click the marionette it jumps or walks, whatever, I just dont know how to start with? Item Handler Idk? Im so confused? Im 75% done with my project any help please? Ill make a tutorial with a christmas event if someone helps me (: thanks!
3003 - marionette jump 3004 - marionette walk 3005 - marionette bow 3006 - mationette dance
